law.catch_line: Cabinet or county clerk to assign same numbers as far as practicable.
law.text: The Transportation Cabinet or county clerk shall insofar as is practicable assign to each motorboat the number previously assigned thereto upon each subsequent registration or transfer.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 391, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 10, effective January 1, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 10, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 11. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 68, Art. VIII, sec. 15, effective March 17, 1960.
